content.rendered:
[vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column]

Scale GTM Benchmarks

[vc_column_text]The 2025 Scale GTM Benchmarks, fielded in partnership with Benchmarkit, comprise GTM performance statistics from 175 high-growth startups in and outside our portfolio.  Filter the data to view instructive goalposts and guidelines for your business and GTM teams.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text] [/vc_column_text]
Filter by Category:
Growth rate
ARR
Number of employees
ACV last 12 months
Primary pricing model
Customer segments served
Primary solution type
Selling AI solution

Choose your benchmark:

Overall Performance Metrics

Revenue Contribution Metrics

Rep & Quota Attainment Metrics

Pipeline Metrics

Headcount Ratios

Headcount by Function

Loading benchmark data...

Select a benchmark and filters to view data

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
